product_name: NYX Professional MakeupSlim Lip Pencil & Butter Gloss Duo Kit
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackThe fan favs NYX Professional Makeup Butter Slim Lip Pencil & Butter Gloss now in a duo! The perfect kit gift for your bestie or yourself!
details: DetailsIncludesButter Gloss Lip Gloss in MadelineSlim Lip Pencil in Nude TruffleFeaturesThe STAPLE combo, now in a convenient duo kit!Featuring Butter Gloss and Slim Lip Pencil, this kit makes for the perfect gift for any makeup lover!Create your look using the Slip Lip Liner and Butter Gloss together, or individually!Butter Gloss non-sticky formula glides on smooth as butter leaving lips, soft and supple with the perfect hint of shine!Slim Lip Pencil long lasting lip pencil never tugs, feathers, bleeds, or fades, bringing shape and definition to your pout!As always cruelty free!Item 2640063How To UseLine upper and lower lips as desired. For a fuller lip look, overline lips just above the lip line with the Slim Lip Pencil. Top your look with the Butter Gloss.IngredientsButter Gloss: Mineral Oil / Paraffinum Liquidum / Huile Minérale, Polybutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Beeswax / Cera Alba / Cire d'Abeille, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire Microcristalline, Polyethylene, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Paraffin, Barium Sulfate (CI 77120), Rosin / Colophonium / Colophane, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance / Parfum. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 (CI 15850), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).Slim Lip Pencil: Sorbitan Isostearate, Isocetyl Stearate,Phenyl Trimethicone, Polyethylene, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Unsaponifiables, Beeswax, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Caprylic / Capric Triglyceride, Nylon-12, Octyldodecanol, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Silica, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Hydrogenated, Coconut Oil, Tocopherol,VP / Hexadecene Copolymer, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate, Propylparaben, Prolylene Carbonate.
how_to_use: Line upper and lower lips as desired. For a fuller lip look, overline lips just above the lip line with the Slim Lip Pencil. Top your look with the Butter Gloss.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: The color was just too dark for me.  Should have purchased a lighter color.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: Always loved the butter glosses by next! The shade! The texture! The feel! But this lip duo was the perfect match. My everyday lip combo from now on

reviews.headline: definitely will be repurchase
reviews.comments: buttery gloss looks amazing!!! the lip liner sooo good for the price!!

reviews.headline: i love it!
reviews.comments: this duo is great for saving a bit if money. the gloss and liner pair perfectly. the perfect nude lip! its not as sticky as some other glosses and the lip liner stayed on my lips for a while. i'd definitely recommend this!

reviews.headline: Favorite duo
reviews.comments: I never really write reviews but this is the first time getting this duo and I absolutely loved it. I have got compliments of what lip pencil and gloss i been using and my answer was NYX overall for me it lasts all day a few touch up here and their. But i love how the product looks on me.

rollup.name: Slim Lip Pencil & Butter Gloss Duo Kit
